website_summaries.verdict: A terrific adjustable bed for those who prioritize comfort and style.
pros: Includes a backlit, wireless, freestanding remote that allows for zero gravity
Features a micro-hook system that eliminates the need for a metal mattress retainer bar
cons: More expensive than similar adjustable beds

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line
customer_reviews.text: This is a great adjustable bed base. It's made far better than the Casper base. It is heavy, solid with a good core fabric. The wall hugger works, so the pillow doesn't fall behind the bed. The adjustable legs really let you make the frame go plenty high.... high enough to accommodate my bed skirt. The bed skirt stays in place thanks to the weight of the mattress. The controls are good. I think the massage is silly and not of any value and would have swapped for the port outlets attached to the frame (which this doesn't have). Velcro on the frame also keeps the mattress in place.
customer_reviews.author: savvyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first adjustable base I've ever had and I absolutely love it. Will never go back to a regular bed! When my base arrived, some of lights underneath didn't work. I called the company and they sent someone right out to fix them. I'm extremely impressed with their customer service. Would definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Adjustable Bed - Queen
customer_reviews.text: I put a green latex mattress on this frame and have never slept better. The massage function is a joke but I have never had a mechanical massage that came close to equalling the human touch. I thought the night light function would be worthless but it is just right. I love that light. The bed does stay close to the wall as the head portion rises. This thing is the bomb. The only thing that upsets me is that I waited until I was 58 to get one. Love this bed frame

product_meta.title: Fashion Bed Group Fashion Bed Group S-Cape 2.0 Adjustable Bed Base with WallHugger Technology and Full Body Massage, Twin/X-Large, Charcoal Gray
product_meta.description: Size:Twin XL| Style:Twin XLWe watch TV, read, play video games and work from the comfort of our beds. It’s the oasis after a long workday, where we seek a tranquil environment that inspires relaxation and rejuvenation. S-Cape 2.0 will cater to these needs, while providing innovative features to help promote a healthy posture during sleep with the user’s comfort in mind. This adjustable base has a 4” low-profile design with a contemporary, charcoal gray patterned fabric. The heavy-duty 2.5” diameter legs are adjustable from 6” to 10” in height so that you’ll always have the perfect fit. A patented MicroHook retention system holds the mattress in place so that you can eliminate the need for a metal mattress retainer bar and the foot of your base. A newly designed, back-lit wireless remote provides the user full control to relieve pressure points with weightless Zero Gravity or find personalized comfort by storing (2) of your favorite positions. Other functions include full-body dual massage with wave motion, and Snore button that quickly elevates the heard of the base 7” to open up airways. These body angle adjustments can potentially help ease stress, reduce soreness in the body, and moderate or eliminate snoring, allowing you to receive the highest level of personal comfort and the sleep you need. While other adjustable bed bases lift your upper body away from the wall, the S-Cape 2.0’s Wallhugger engineering lifts you up, while simultaneously gliding you back so that your nightstand and free standing remote are always within reach. Under the bed you’ll find lighting to provide ambience and functionality, and a high-performance motor with lift capacity of up to 850-lbs. A flat button can also be programmed for safety and convenience, and in the event that electricity is lost, the emergency power-down feature will slowly lower the base. The S-Cape 2.0 Adjustable Base comes with a 1-year full product, 3-year parts and labor, and 25-year parts only warranty.
feature_bullets: Twin XL sized, 4" profile adjustable base with Wallhugger technology and Charcoal gray upholstery
Back-lit wireless freestanding remote allows for Zero Gravity, (2) programmable positions, Under-Bed Lighting, Full-Body Dual Message, Safety Lock and more
Exclusive MicroHook system eliminates need for metal mattress retainer bar
Snore button, 6" - 10" adjustable legs, 850-lb. lift capacity motor, and other safety features included
Measures 79” (L) x 38” (W) x 17” (H) and comes with a 1, 3, and 25-year limited warranty
